channel.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
channel.description:
http://www.microsoft.com/windows/internet-explorer/get-the-facts/browser-comparison.aspx
How the fuck can they even put this online?
edit: They point out Mozilla, and a new browser in BETA whilst IE has been in development for years and years, and still manages to be shittier than Chrome.

item.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

IE8 = More fail than wL.

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers

item.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:28, topic:284177”]My uncle (who knows nothing about computers) accidentally clicked the upgrade to IE8 and now it won’t load any websites, saying that msn, yahoo, and google all have ‘potentially malicious code’ on them and it is protecting his computer by not loading them. It gave the option to turn that off, but even when I selected that it would not load them. In the end I had to install firefox even though he doesn’t like how it is ‘different’ because that is the only way he could get on the internet.

Oh yea, IE8 is so good it refuses to show you the internet…[/quote]
Wow, at least Firefox’s web-filter isn’t annoying (and actually works).

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers

item.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

Firefox and Chrome have more support for emerging standards like HTML5 and CSS3, but Internet Explorer 8 invested heavily in having world-class, consistent support for the entire CSS2.1 specification.

Fancy Microsoft market bullshit for covering up the fact that they just haven’t gotten around to it yet/or it has too many bugs at the moment o.O

Edit:
Going to the “Reasons to install” tab

Recover from crashes quickly. Came across a site that caused a tab to crash? No worries, your browser session is stable, thanks to new tab isolation and crash recovery features.
Well lets not fix the reason its crashing, just give it a fast recovery time..win.

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers

item.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Sure, Firefox may win in sheer number of add-ons, but many of the customizations you'd want to download for Firefox are already a part of Internet Explorer 8 – right out of the box.

IE8 doesn’t have AdBlock, FTP clients, YouTube downloaders.

I say you fail :s

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers

item.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:28, topic:284177”]My uncle (who knows nothing about computers) accidentally clicked the upgrade to IE8 and now it won’t load any websites, saying that msn, yahoo, and google all have ‘potentially malicious code’ on them and it is protecting his computer by not loading them. It gave the option to turn that off, but even when I selected that it would not load them. In the end I had to install firefox even though he doesn’t like how it is ‘different’ because that is the only way he could get on the internet.

Oh yea, IE8 is so good it refuses to show you the internet…[/quote]

Can’t you just remove it form the Add or remove programs thing in Control Panel? You can do it with most updates.

item.source: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers

item.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

My uncle (who knows nothing about computers) accidentally clicked the upgrade to IE8 and now it won’t load any websites, saying that msn, yahoo, and google all have ‘potentially malicious code’ on them and it is protecting his computer by not loading them. It gave the option to turn that off, but even when I selected that it would not load them. In the end I had to install firefox even though he doesn’t like how it is ‘different’ because that is the only way he could get on the internet.

Oh yea, IE8 is so good it refuses to show you the internet…

Read full topic

AH AH AHAHA AHAHAHHAHAH AHAHHAHHAAHHAHAHAHHA AHHAHAHAHHAHHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHHAHAHAH AHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHA AHHHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA

item.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

eczema3:

Most people who create websites make it firefox friendly(Which goes for safari, opera chrome etc…) which uses the Gecko engine(amirite?)

True fact.

This is total bullshit; IE can’t be configured to the extent of other browsers (it can’t even automatically clear web-history & cookies…), it is bloated, list goes on…

Microsoft best be trollin’.

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers

item.title: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

They claim that it’s more compatible with more sites on the Internet… Most people who create websites make it firefox friendly(Which goes for safari, opera chrome etc…) which uses the Gecko engine(amirite?) but Microshit decided to create their own engine which is why IE works differently && displays sites differently to firefox etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Microsoft proves it, IE8 is better than all other browsers
